version_description:
It's a brand new free update for Mega Run! Here's what we've added:

- 4 rare characters are making a comeback! Look out for Pina, Radford, Stacheford and Bryan the Snowman in the Store!
- A new feature that gives you free revives!
- iOS 8

- New for this awesome update are the Shellini and Teen Rolf playable characters! Unlock these limited-time cinematic super heroes while you can!
- Bug fixes

It's the 3rd Anniversary of Mega Run, and we're celebrating with a sizzling new update!

A BRAND NEW WORLD - LAVA CAVES! Get ready to feel the heat in this dangerous underground lair!
24 ALL NEW STAGES! Featuring fiendish traps, crazy jumping puz

- fixes a bug that prevented playing in Lava Caves on iPhone 5S
- fixes a bug that prevented selecting a stage on an iPhone 6S or iPhone 6S Plus
